text: I think that Shortcake's might be my
favorite dessert don't tell the other
desserts okay let's just keep it between
us so today I'm making an extra-special
Shortcake the biscuits actually have
raspberries inside of them they're a
raspberry Shortcake with whipped cream
and blueberries super delish and it
might just become your favorite dessert
too so over here I have two and a half
cups of all-purpose flour in my food
processor and to that I'm going to add
half a cup of sugar a tablespoon of
baking powder and 1/2 a teaspoon of fine
salt just pulse that up a little bit I
just like to combine everything before I
add my butter now what you want to do is
pulse in one stick of cold unsalted
butter cut into pieces what you're
looking for are clumps about the size of
small peas and then smaller nothing
larger because you want your biscuits to
be flaky this looks pretty good I'm
gonna transfer it into a glass bowl to
add the liquid ingredients in this
measuring cup I have 3/4 of a cup of
heavy cream I'm gonna add 1/4 cup of
buttermilk to that this is low-fat
buttermilk add that directly to your dry
ingredients at the same time add a cup
of raspberries and then just stir until
a dough comes together I'm gonna form
these into rounds with my hand so I'm
not going to over mix it as long as my
dough comes together when I press it I
know that it's ready you want to make
about 8 biscuits out of this dough so
try to divide it as evenly as you can
once you have your 8 clumps all
separated then you can just press them
into little rounds about an inch thick
then just place them about 2 inches
apart on your baking sheets all right
these are relatively even hey I never
said I was perfect okay and now if you
want to and I do want to you can
sprinkle the top of these with some
sugar I'm gonna use coarse sanding sugar
because I have it but you can totally
use regular sugar adds just a little bit
of crunch a little bit of brownness and
a little bit of sweetness to these
biscuits in order for the biscuits to
hold their shape really nicely you want
to freeze them for
about 15 minutes before you bake them
and then bake them at 400 for about 20
minutes so cool your biscuits cool your
biscuits slice them in half open them up
spoon a little bit of whipped cream on
them much as little as you want
sweetened or unsweetened to your choice
I like a little bit of sugar in mine and
then some berries I'm using blueberries
cuz it's a red white and blue fantastic
treat for the 4th of July it's super
duper easy and it doesn't take very long
at all chill for 15 the bake for 20 red
white and blue shortcake probably my new
favorite dessert let's see I mean I know
what it tastes like I'm just gonna taste
it I'm doing it for you mmm YUM this
bits really tender and delicious it
might just become your new favorite
dessert taking the place of all other
desserts in your heart
she says eating the whole thing hi guys
thanks for watching this video be sure
to click here if you want to subscribe
and click over here if you want to
